title.rendered: Max Quat 10% Sanitizer – Pressure Washing Chemical Disinfectant

content.rendered:
Max-Quat 10% Sanitizer: Superior Sanitization for Every Industry

Keep your workspace cleaner, safer, and healthier with Max-Quat 10% Sanitizer! Whether you’re operating a school, hospital, restaurant, or food processing facility, this powerful sanitizer ensures you meet the highest standards of cleanliness. With an active quaternary concentration of 200 ppm, Max-Quat is your best defense against harmful bacteria like E. coli, Listeria, Salmonella, and more. Say goodbye to germs and hello to a safe environment!

Why Choose Max-Quat?

  • Highly Effective: Max-Quat tackles a wide range of bacteria and pathogens, making it an essential tool in your sanitation arsenal.
  • Versatile Application: Perfect for use in restaurants, food processing plants, bars, schools, and hospitals—anywhere sanitation is a priority.
  • Easy-to-Mix: Whether you’re using it for direct application or mixing it for use with a downstream injector, Max-Quat’s mixing ratios are clear and simple.

Quick and Easy Mixing Directions:

  • Direct Application: Mix 1 oz per 2 gallons of water for immediate use.
  • Downstream Injector: For a 20:1 ratio, add 6¼ cups to a 5-gallon container. For 30:1, use 9½ cups.

Ready to simplify your sanitization process? Max-Quat is designed for maximum convenience and strength. Safe on hard surfaces and formulated to meet EPA standards, it’s a perfect addition to any business that takes cleanliness seriously.

Why Buy from PowerWash.com? With over 50 years of industry experience, PowerWash.com is more than just a supplier—we’re your trusted partner. Our expertise, top-tier products, and customer-first approach ensure you get exactly what you need to maintain the highest level of sanitation. Let us help you take the worry out of cleaning, so you can focus on running your business smoothly.

With an active quaternary concentration of 200 ppm, Max-Quat is your best defense against harmful bacteria like E. coli, Listeria, Salmonella, and more. Say goodbye to germs and hello to a safe environment!

yoast_head_json.title: Max Quat 10% Sanitizer for Pressure Washing | PowerWash
yoast_head_json.description: Max-Quat 10% Sanitizer: Superior Sanitization for Every Industry  Keep your workspace cleaner, safer, and healthier with Max-Quat 10% Sanitizer! Whether you're operating a school, hospital, restaurant, or food processing facility, this powerful sanitizer ensures you meet the highest standards of cleanliness. With an active quaternary concentration of 200 ppm, Max-Quat is your best defense against harmful bacteria like E. coli, Listeria, Salmonella, and more. Say goodbye to germs and hello to a safe environment!
